downloadTitle: Government Contracting and Microsoft Dynamics AX
downloadDescription: White paper on Government Contracting requirements and considerations in planning for a Dynamics AX implementation.

downloadFile.name: Government Contracting and Microsoft Dynamics AX USv1.0.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/7/0/070d5a0d-21a8-4f29-ae9a-078dc10f5baf/Government Contracting and Microsoft Dynamics AX USv1.0.pdf

detailsSection:
This two-part white paper, authored by accounting firm McGladrey and published by Microsoft, offers factual information on regulatory compliance requirements faced by government contractors and an assessment of known gaps that customers and partners may need to bridge when planning a Dynamics AX implementation.

Part 1 offers a "Government contractor’s guide to regulatory compliance and requirements for an Enterprise Resource Planning solution."
Part 2 provides a "Baseline gap-fit assessment of Microsoft Dynamics AX as an ERP for government contracting."
detailsSection_file_name: Government Contracting and Microsoft Dynamics AX USv1.0.pdf
installInstructionSection: Download available to audiences in the United States.
